content.question: Nigeria has significantly increased its importance as a regional power through its leadership in which of the following organizations?

choices.label: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD)
Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS)

content.answer: Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS)

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
